data.name: Dark Beast
data.description: A twisted version of Hank McCoy from an alternate universe, Dark Beast aligned with Apocalypse to experiment on his fellow mutants, inflicting them with devastating negative Status Effects.

starItems.name: Dark Beast
starItems.description: A twisted version of Hank McCoy from an alternate universe, Dark Beast aligned with Apocalypse to experiment on his fellow mutants, inflicting them with devastating negative Status Effects.

1.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

7.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with Dark Beast's stats instead of the primary target. Clone gains <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call a random ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
Clone gains <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies

2.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with Dark Beast's stats instead of the primary target. Clone gains <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call a random ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance call a random ally with the highest Damage

3.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with Dark Beast's stats instead of the primary target. Clone gains <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to call a random ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
Always call a random ally with the highest Damage
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with Dark Beast's stats instead of the primary target. Clone gains <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
Call a random ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with Dark Beast's stats instead of the primary target. Clone gains <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
Call a random ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade: Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies with the highest Damage

6.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with Dark Beast's stats instead of the primary target. Clone gains <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with Dark Beast's stats instead of the primary target. Clone gains <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Revive a dead <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

1.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect  into negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

2.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects  into negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects  into negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects

4.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects  into negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects  into negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects  into negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns .

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects into negative effects on primary and adjacent targets.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns .

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> allies.

1.description:
These following effects are negated if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>:
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
1.nextUpgrade: Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Assist Chance per <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally

2.description:
These following effects are negated if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>:
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Assist Chance per <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade: While this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor

3.description:
These following effects are negated if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>:
> While this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Assist Chance per <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Speed

4.description:
These following effects are negated if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>:
> While this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Speed.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Assist Chance per <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
On turn, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect on a non-summoned enemy with the highest Speed
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects instead + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> that enemy

5.description:
These following effects are negated if this character has <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>:
> While this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Armor.
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
> In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, while this character or any <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, they gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Speed.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Assist Chance per <color=#fff568>DEATH SEED</color> ally.

On Turn, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect on a non-summoned enemy with the highest Speed.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects instead + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to that enemy.
